revised_title: Anatomy and Affinities of the Phyllirrho bucephala
tldr: The author examines the anatomy and affinities of the Phyllirrho bucephala, a mysterious and elusive marine creature. Through detailed observations and analysis, the author concludes that this species belongs to the original species described by Peron and shares similarities with Glaucus and Pteropods. The study provides valuable insights into the taxonomy and classification of this fascinating organism.
